name: Hazelcast Jca Resource Adapter
shortDescription: The Hazelcast JCA resource adapter Community project is a system-level software driver used by a Java application to connect to an Hazelcast Cluster.
longDescription: Hazelcast JCA resource adapter is a system-level software driver used by a Java application to connect to an Hazelcast Cluster.   This module is developed and supported by the Community contributor.  Copy and paste the following snippet into your build:
